name: gnome candy cane holder ornament
notes:
> this pattern is available [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern (including all of the photo tutorials), in one printable file without advertisements.

need a last minute gift? make a crochet gnome candy cane holder and ornament!

this cute (and super quick) crochet christmas ornament also doubles as a fun diy christmas gift tag!

**gnome’s friends make an ornament gift set!**

[santa][2]

[gingerbread boy & girl][3]

[snowman][4]

[reindeer][5]

[elf][6]

**yarn**
i used a worsted weight cotton yarn, but several other fibers will work as well.

crochet candy cane holder is an a crocheted simplicity original design.

join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases, giveaways, sales and testing opportunities: https://www.facebook.com/groups/906744872727855/

you can also find me on etsy (a crocheted simplicity) & love crafts.

all of my patterns are written in standard american (u.s.) terms, unless noted otherwise.

please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds, however, i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions.
